00011 class ScpAttributeBase
00012 {
00013 public:
00014 
00015     const ScpAttributeBase* getNext() const { return next_; }
00016     virtual void asString(std::ostream& ss) = 0;
00017 
00018 protected:
00019 
00020     virtual ~ScpAttributeBase();
00021     ScpAttributeBase* getNext() { return next_; }
00022 
00023     friend class ScpBuilder;
00024     friend class ScpCommand;
00025     ScpAttributeBase* next_;
00026 
00027 };
00028 
00029 template<typename T>
00030 class ScpAttribute : ScpAttributeBase
00031 {
00032 
00033 private:
00034     friend class ScpBuilder;
00035 
00036     ScpAttribute(const std::string& _name, const T& _value)
00037         : ScpAttributeBase()
00038         , name_(_name)
00039         , value_(_value) { }
00040 
00041     virtual void asString(std::ostream& stream) { asString<T>(*this, stream); }
00042 
00043     template<typename X>
00044     static void asString(const ScpAttribute<X>& attribute, std::ostream& stream)
00045     {
00046         stream << attribute.name_ << "=\"" << attribute.value_ << "\"";
00047     }
00048 
00049     std::string name_;
00050     T value_;
00051 
00052 };

00070

00088     static const ScpCommand Step;
00089     static const ScpCommand Stop;
00090     static const ScpCommand Sync;

00092 
00093     // Sensor sub tags

00102 
00103     // Screen text message
00104     static const ScpCommand Text;
00105     static const ScpCommand PosScreen;
00106 
00107     ScpCommand(const ScpCommand& other);
00108     ~ScpCommand();
00109

00111

00113     ScpCommand* getFirstChild() const { return firstChild_; }
00114     ScpCommand* getNext() const { return next_; }
00115 
00116 private:

00122

00128 
00135 class ScpBuilder
00136 {
00137 
00138 public:
00139 
00140     ScpBuilder();
00141     ~ScpBuilder();
00142 
00149     void beginScpCommand(const ScpCommand& command);
00150 
00154     template<typename T>
00155     void addScpAttribute(const std::string& name, const T& value)
00156     {
00157         VTD_ASSERT(currentScpCommand_ != 0);
00158 
00159         ScpAttributeBase* attribute = new ScpAttribute<T>(name, value);
00160         if (currentAttribute_ == 0)
00161         {
00162             currentAttribute_ = attribute;
00163             currentScpCommand_->firstAttribute_ = attribute;
00164         }
00165         else
00166         {
00167             currentAttribute_->next_ = attribute;
00168             currentAttribute_ = attribute;
00169         }
00170     }
00171 
00172     template<typename T>
00173     void addScpAttribute(const std::string& name, const T* value);
00174 
00179     const ScpCommand& endScpCommand();
00180 
00186     std::string asString();
00187 
00188 private:
00189     void addChildCommand(ScpCommand& parent, ScpCommand& child);
00190 
00191     ScpCommand rootCommand_; // root node for all commands.
00192 
00193     ScpCommand* currentScpCommand_;
00194     ScpAttributeBase* currentAttribute_;
00195     std::stack<ScpCommand*> scpCommandHierarchy_;
00196 };
